bike.description: 6061 aluminum triple butted main tubes with hydro-formed top and down tube, taper gauge “S" bend stays, replaceable derailleur hanger, eyeleted dropouts and seatstay rack mounts

components.description: Chromoly straight blade unicrown with bulge butted chromoly steerer, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropout with single eyelets
Alex DC25 double wall alloy rims, 32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shield puncture protection, 700 x 32c
Shimano Acera RD-M360 rear and Shimano FD-TX51 bottom pull front
Shimano EZ-FIRE PLUS window type, ST-EF51, 21-Speed
Comfort platform style with TPE non-slip insert
Jamis flat bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
Jamis Trekking, 3D forged alloy, 10JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (15-17"), 110mm (19-23")
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm, alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Jamis Touring with SL cover and satin steel rails, gender specific
Tektro RX-1.0 linear-pull with front power modulator and Shimano brake levers
